subject: Wrestling
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: FAYETTEVILLE, Ga., June 25 (AP) — The professional wrestler Chris Benoit, his wife and his son were found dead Monday. The police said they were investigating the deaths as a murder-suicide.
snippet: FAYETTEVILLE, Ga., June 25 (AP) — The professional wrestler Chris Benoit, his wife and his son were found dead Monday. The police said they were investigating the deaths as a murder-suicide.
